item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Congratulations Derick, good stuff :) Please be sure to blog about the latest technologies you're playing with outside Backbone, it's always good to read :D!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Derick, good stuff :) Please be sure to blog about the latest technologies you’re playing with outside Backbone, it’s always good to read :D!

item.title: By: fernandozamoraj
item.dc:creator: fernandozamoraj
item.description: Congratulations! Sounds like a perfect fit.

item.title: By: Frank
item.dc:creator: Frank
item.description: congrats! I hope you can bloging about how to use KendoUI with Marionette to build large apps or Mobile apps(i am currently making a ios app with PhoneGap).
item.content:encoded: congrats! I hope you can bloging about how to use KendoUI with Marionette to build large apps or Mobile apps(i am currently making a ios app with PhoneGap).

item.title: By: John Reilly
item.dc:creator: John Reilly
item.description: Great news! I've used Kendo UI a little and it gave me warm fuzzy feelings :-) - hope you really enjoy the new role.
item.content:encoded: Great news! I’ve used Kendo UI a little and it gave me warm fuzzy feelings :-) – hope you really enjoy the new role.

item.title: By: Danyelle Hankal
item.dc:creator: Danyelle Hankal
item.description: Congrats Derick...this fits you perfectly! Wishing you all the luck in the world...
item.content:encoded: Congrats Derick…this fits you perfectly! Wishing you all the luck in the world…

item.title: By: Nolan Egly

item.description: Congratulations! I wish you all the best at Telerik.
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! I wish you all the best at Telerik.

item.title: By: agilejoe
item.dc:creator: agilejoe
item.description: Congrats! Happy for ya. Now I know who to go and complain about when it comes to Kendo :)
